lead_paragraph: President Obama, apparently referring to Donald J. Trump’s decision to appoint a hard-right nationalist to a top post, spoke in Greece during his final overseas trip as president.

headline.print_headline: In Europe, Obama Warns Against Nationalism
headline.main: Visiting Europe, Obama Warns Against Rise of ‘Crude Sort of Nationalism’

snippet: President Obama, apparently referring to Donald J. Trump’s decision to appoint a hard-right nationalist to a top post, spoke in Greece during his final overseas trip as president....
abstract: Pres Obama, during news conference in Athens, warns against rise of nationalistic tribalism, using some of his strongest language since Donald Trump's presidential win; call for inclusiveness is apparent reference to Trump's appointment of hard-right nationalist Stephen K Bannon to top position.
